name: Summon Cacodaemon
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Horsemen of the Apocalypse: Book of the Damned, Vol. 3 © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like summon monster, except it summons a single cacodaemon.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、器材(一根银色钩子)
text_zh: 本法术的效果和召唤怪物一样，除了本法术召唤的是一只狂躁邪魔。
